name: Robot IronZilla:Amazing Toy Fight
description:
Like solve the puzzle? Like bots fight? Like big monster? Iron Zilla is the best one for you！

Domination of the city. Destroy the building like godzilla. you will be invincible!
In fight mode, you will meet multiple bosses and would use your skill to defeat them.

Key Feature:
- Get the pieces out of the box.
- Create a big robot monster.
- Be the domination of the city.
- Defeat the boss with your cool skill.

You will enjoy the awesome fighting experience！
